definition: a portrait showing the body from only the waist up, abridged to half its original length
details:
noun
- a portrait showing the body from only the waist up
= example: a portrait showing the body from only the waist up
adjective
- abridged to half its original length
= example: abridged to half its original length
- representing only the upper half of the body
= example: representing only the upper half of the body
